::Demise::

Demise groans, floating under the ice. The cold didn't bother him at 
all, he was designed for extreme temperatures. What bothered him was 
the gap of armor in his back.

Seeing the river lowering underground, Demise swims downward. His 
repair system activates.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
> Tankkor, Inferno, Paralysis, and Aerostreak send a squad of missles 
and 
> dischrges at the Nightmares, giving Hell Beast and Aracnia a chance 
to get 
> away.
>        "Idiots. Kill them!" Hell Beast commands, as he, and the 
other bots 
> begin to massacre the Nightmares.
> 
>        "Excellent. We have them on the run. Now we just have to 
sweep those 
> Nightmares out of the way." Megatron smiles. "Nighteyes, Aquarious, 
go and 
> assist them."
> 
>        Ominous Primes watched Hell Beast get jumped. It was a nice 
sight to 
> see his archenemy in such agony.
>        "I do believe theyre in my old base...." He murmured to 
himself. 
> 
>        Rampage climed on shore, whick was an iceburg. He didnt see 
Demise 
> anywhere, but at least he was somewhat ok. He raised his grappling 
hook, and 
> climed back up the cliff. Seeing the Nightmares attacking, he joined 
his team
